projects.name: Chatbot built in javascript
projects.description: The chat bot app is a conversational AI-powered tool designed to enhance user experience by providing instant, personalized, and automated responses to user inquiries.

projects.name: Weather app
projects.description: In this project, a weather web app that fetches data from the OpenWeatherMap API is created. The App will display the city name, current temperature, and weather description. Additionally, it can implement features like sunrise and sunset times, a 5-day weather forecast, and styling based on weather conditions. Stretch goals include dynamic color changes based on weather, multiple city options, geolocation, and CSS animations for added visual appeal.

projects.name: Guess who the game
projects.description: The Guess Who Game project involves creating a web-based version of the classic board game. It uses HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build a user-friendly interface and implement game logic. The game allows players to guess a secret character by asking yes or no questions. Features include audio and deployment on a web server for online access. Possible improvements include adding more characters and questions, implementing a scoring system, and enhancing the user interface. You can play the game here.

projects.name: Music Releases
projects.description: A React app template to display albums. Features include a structured component hierarchy, design fidelity, hover effects, and responsive layouts. Clicking on albums or artists links to external URLs. Components provided; focus on data flow and UI interactions.

projects.name: Survey
projects.description: A React project to create a customizable survey form. Focus on React state and form control. After submission, users see a summary. Design is flexible but should prioritise accessibility. Use tools like Typeform for design inspiration.
